Title: Highest instruction
Publisher: Red Guards Shanghai  Revolutionary Committee to Defend Mao Zedong Thought (Red Defence Group) "East Wind" Editorial Group (紅卫兵上海市捍卫毛泽东思想革命委员会 (紅捍会）《东风》编辑部)
Notes: Small poster, printed on two sides (the other side is BG C32/476).39 Caricatures of prominent Party members, specialists, scholars and other functionaries who were under attack.On the two bottom rows foreign politicians and state leaders.First row: Lyndon B. Johnson (USA), Leonid Brezhnev (USSR), Alexei Kosygin (USSR), Chiang Kai-shek (Taiwan), Harold Wilson (UK), Yumjaagiin Tsedenbal (Mongolia), Indira Gandhi (India).Last row: Nikita Khrushchev (USSR), Tito (Yugoslavia), Sukarno (Indonesia), Abdul Haris Nasution (Indonesia), Ne Win (Burma), Mikhail Sholokhov (USSR, a famous writer), Kenji Miyamoto (Japan).
